"Des racines et des ailes" is a French television documentary series created by Patrick de Carolis and Patrick Charles in 1998. "Des racines et des ailes" is broadcast two Wednesdays per month on the France 3 television network. This DVD does not have a menu and is in French only with no subtitles. It is a great resource for teachers and students of the French language.
